1: <pb/><t>Chitz'onoj tok'ob</t> <t>che ri Ajawaxel,</t> <t>utzalaj tak winak;</t> <t>chquichi' tak ri e utz,</t> <t>je'lic ri k'ijilanic.</t>
2: <t>Chiya' maltioxinic che ri Ajawaxel</t> <t>ruc' rok'ebal arp,</t> <t>chebibixoj bix che</t> <t>ruc' rok'ebal nimalaj arp,</t>
3: <t>chibixoj jun c'ac' bix che,</t> <t>¡utzalaj k'ojomanic</t> <t>chibana' che u k'ijilaxic!</t>
4: <pb/><t>Ri u tzij ri Ajawaxel kastzij;</t> <t>ri e u chac cäquic'ut ri u jicomal.</t>
5: <t>Ri Ajawaxel culok'ok'ej ri suq'uilal</t> <t>xukuje' ri jicomal;</t> <t>ri lok'ok'ebal u c'u'x u nojisam</t> <t>ronojel ri uwächulew.</t>
6: <t>Ri caj xukuje'</t> <t>ronojel ri c'o chuwäch</t> <t>are' ri Ajawaxel xbanowic ruc' ri u tzij</t> <t>xukuje' ruc' ri ruxlab ri xel pa u chi'.</t>
7: <t>Ri are' cumulij cut'ajij c'u ri ja'</t> <t>re ri nimalaj plo.</t>
8: <pb/><t>Chiya' u k'ij ri Ajawaxel</t> <t>iwonojel cho ri ulew;</t> <t>¡chyok u k'ij cumal conojel</t> <t>ri e jekel cho ri uwächulew!</t>
9: <t>Aretak c'u xch'awic,</t> <t>ronojel xbantajic;</t> <t>xtakanic, ronojel c'ut co xjeki'.</t>
10: <t>Ri Ajawaxel cuyojij ronojel</t> <t>ri qui chomanic ri winak</t> <t>ri e k'ijilal tak diosib,</t>
11: <t>are c'u ri u chomanic ri Ajawaxel</t> <t>cäjeki' na chbe k'ij sak.</t>
12: <t>Utz rech ri tinimit</t> <t>ri are' u Dios ri Ajawaxel,</t> <t>ri tinimit ri u cha'om</t> <t>rech cux rech.</t>
13: <pb/><t>Ri Ajawaxel cäca'y ulok chicaj</t> <t>queril conojel ri winak;</t>
14: <t>pa ri c'olbal</t> <t>ri c'o wi quebuca'yej ulok ri winak</t> <t>cho ri uwächulew;</t>
15: <t>are' xnuc'uw ri canima'</t> <t>xukuje' coc il che rilic ri cäquibano.</t>
16: <pb/><t>Man c'o ta jun ajawinel cäto'taj ta</t> <t>cumal ri q'uialaj e rajch'ojab,</t> <t>mawi queto'taj ri c'o qui chuk'ab</t> <t>rumal ri nimalaj qui chuk'ab;</t>
17: <t>ri quiej man quecuin ta</t> <t>che u to'ic jun winak;</t> <t>pune' c'o sibalaj qui chuk'ab,</t> <t>man quetoban taj.</t>
18: <pb/><t>Ri Ajawaxel amak'el quebuchajij</t> <t>ri nim quil wi cumal</t> <t>xukuje' ri cu'l qui c'u'x</t> <t>chrij ri lok'ok'ebal u c'u'x,</t>
19: <t>che quesaxic pa ri cämical</t> <t>cuya' c'u qui c'aslemal</t> <t>pa tak ri k'ijol re wi'jal.</t>
20: <pb/><t>Ri uj ka cuban ka c'u'x</t> <t>chrij ri Ajawaxel;</t> <t>¡ri are' cujuto'</t> <t>xukuje' ka quetequic ch'ich'!</t>
21: <t>Ri kanima' caquicot ruc' ri Ajawaxel;</t> <t>kas ka cuban ka c'u'x</t> <t>chrij ri tastalicalaj u bi'.</t>
22: <t>¡Chujrachilaj</t> <t>ri lok'ok'ebal c'u'x la, Ajawaxel,</t> <t>jacha' ri keye'm che la!</t>
